review I would count the entire HP series as one book on my top 10 list...

review This is what a book about tornados should be. Written by someone who has dedicated his life to chasing them, Faidley's book doesn't waste time on inco This is what a book about tornados should be. Written by someone who has dedicated his life to chasing them, Faidley's book doesn't waste time on inconsequential details of the world at large. Instead he focuses on all tornados all the time. This book also has some great photos of storms. ...more

review It's been 24 hours since I finished this one, and I think I'm having Oasis withdrawal. This is one of the best fiction books by a new (to me) author I It's been 24 hours since I finished this one, and I think I'm having Oasis withdrawal. This is one of the best fiction books by a new (to me) author I've read in a LONG time. I listened to the audio (read by the delightful Evil Wil Wheaton) and this is the first time I've ever wanted to just go back to the beginning and listen again. And then maybe again. I'm not a gamer, but there is so much geeky goodness stockpiled in here that I didn't even care. But I am mad that Wade decided to change the name of his Firefly ship from The Kaylee to The Vonnegut. Sorry dude. NOT a good change. If you've ever geeked out about anything - check this one out. Thanksgiving 2012 - Went on a TN to IN to WI to IN to TN roadtrip with the boyfriend and actually got him hooked on this one too! He's not a reader at all, so I didn't know if he'd like it, but he's a big gamer and he was hooked. Do I know my books or what? :) Reread again for Nashville to Florida road trip 2014. Still an awesome book! ...more
